text: Ni Rabbow Ta Addunyaa kee akeeral maqaane neh uktub, diggah Ni Rabbow dambik kol nuduurek iyye Nabii Muusa, Yalli Nabii Muusak: Yi digaala Yi naqoosak innih faxa mara tet xagsaah Yi Racmatah tugactek addunyal eneyyi ittam duddu haa, cagalah akeeral Yallak meesitaah ZakÃ¡ yaceeh Ninkittinaanee kee Ni dudda tascasse Nastooti Nummaysa marah tet aktubeyyo iyye Yalli
